div.em: Current conditions as of 26 Apr 15:35 pm MDT

div.div: Scattered showers and thunderstorms. Partly sunny, with a high near 73. West northwest wind 10 to 15 mph. Chance of precipitation is 30%.
Scattered showers and thunderstorms, mainly before 9pm. Mostly cloudy, then gradually becoming mostly clear, with a low around 37. West wind 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precipitation is 30%.
Sunny, with a high near 80. West wind 5 to 15 mph.
